FuncDef: This command configures the maximum number of routes (prefixes) that can be exported into RIP from the route table.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the maximum number of routes (prefixes) that can be exported into RIP from the route table. Values-1 to 4294967295.
Specifies the percentage of the export-limit, at which a warning log message and SNMP notification would be sent. Values-1 to 100.
